text:
Morning all, after another successful week last week, we’ll be running some AvB testing this week whereby for two separate tournaments (Mumbai and Antalya), we’ll be running half of the matches as normal and half under _no delays for passive bets_. We’re still hoping to have API sign-posting in Q1.

Start times aren’t ideal this week with a few of the below already in-play or finished but for interest, the following is on today’s list;

*ITF W50 Navi Mumbai*
 33872465 : Singles Matches / Fangran Tian v Kanako Morisaki
 33872463 : Singles Matches / Honoka Kobayashi v Zuzanna Pawlikowska
 33872461 : Singles Matches / Jizel Matos Sequeira Fernandes v Eva Garkusha
 33872829 : Singles Matches / Thasaporn Naklo v Diana Marcinkevica

*ITF W15 Antalya*
 33873383 : Singles Matches / Maria Kalyakina v Briana Szabo
 33873387 : Singles Matches / Sarah Melany Fajmonova v Denise Valente

text: I missed off a crucial piece of info here...all odd number events ID's will be under the _no delays for passive bets_ matcher. All even number event ID's will be under the normal matcher. This will be the case for the rest of the week.
